li.label: Trans Man
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} identifies strongly as a man. Physical traits related to the Male gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.

li.label: Trans Woman
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} identifies strongly as a woman. Physical traits related to the Female gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.

li.label: Trans: Androgyne
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} does not want to be identified as any gender. The closer to truly androgynous they are, the happier they are.

li.label: Inhuman
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes humanity is the true monster. They want to shed their humanity and become monsterlike.

li.label: Body-content
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is content with their body, regardless of their identified gender. They will experience no form of dysphoria.

li.label: Body-sensitive
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is much more affected by dysphoria than normal.
